name: SLIMEWOOD
description:
For the last ten  years,  the aptly named "Slimewood" forest has become overrun by alien slimes on Halloween! Sami, the heir to Slimewood, is mysteriously immune to the effects of their slime-ly radiations, and has taken it upon herself to keep the forest clean and free of slime every year.

Help Sami clear out all of the slimes in the forest! Then she can finally go trick-or-treating with her friends.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Press the WASD keys to run around.

Press the LEFT MOUSE button to jab your syringe. While stuck in a slime, keep pressing to pull the slime  into the syringe.

Press P or ESC to pause.

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

Use the LEFT STICK to run around.

Press the RIGHT TRIGGER or X/Y button to jab your syringe. While stuck in a slime, keep pressing to pull the slime  into the syringe.

Press the START button to pause.

*Mac OS 32/64 bit is the release version. Windows platform available as a beta.
